__data__.text:
Dear Sir/Madam,
I am writing to express my keen interest in roles such as Data Engineer, Data Scientist, or AI/ML
Engineer. With a strong background in Python, Machine Learning, Java, and SQL, coupled with a
passion for continuous learning and problem-solving, I am eager to contribute my skills effectively.
Over the past 29 months, I have gained hands-on experience in software development, machine
learning model building, and data analytics. My tenure in previous roles allowed me to develop AI
models for assessing mango fruit ripeness, integrate software solutions seamlessly, and conduct
extensive data analysis using Python. Additionally, my internship experiences have honed my ability
to design user-friendly applications, automate data ingestion processes, and enhance predictive
modeling techniques.
Beyond my professional engagements, I actively work on in-house projects and coding challenges,
continuously enhancing my technical expertise. My in-house project, an AI-driven AutoML pipeline,
along with my work on a malicious DNS traffic detection system, reflects my ability to innovate and
tackle complex problems.
I am excited about the prospect of leveraging my technical skills and analytical mindset in a dynamic
environment. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your needs.
Thank you for your time and consideration. 
Best regards,
B. Dheeraj Chandan - 7995987744
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/balivada-dheeraj-chandan-022b91223
